results.title: Between a Frock and a Hard Place
results.brief_description: A behind-the-scenes look at how a low-budget Australian film about three drag queens changed the course of history and loudly and proudly brought a celebration of gay culture to the world that continues to resonate decades later.

constellations_other.name: Joy of drag
constellations_other.description: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert is a groundbreaking Australian film with a small budget and big impact that's taken queer Australian stories to the world.

results.title_for_label: Between a Frock and a Hard Place
results.description: This is the story behind one of the world’s most loved films; about three unlikely Australian hero-(ine)s daring to step up from the shadows in their shimmering sequined glory and be counted. It’s the story of how a low-budget Australian film about three drag queens changed the course of history and loudly and proudly brought a celebration of gay culture to the world that continues to resonate twenty years on.
description_for_label: This is the story behind one of the world’s most loved films; about three unlikely Australian hero-(ine)s daring to step up from the shadows in their shimmering sequined glory and be counted. It’s the story of how a low-budget Australian film about three drag queens changed the course of history and loudly and proudly brought a celebration of gay culture to the world that continues to resonate twenty years on.

results.title: Betty Viazim. - Short version.
results.creator_credit: Daro Gunzburg, Elizabeth Knight and Film Australia
results.brief_description: Looks at the life and work of Betty Viazim a milliner who began her apprenticeship at thirteen in 1922 in Sydney. During her career she worked for theatre and film and her creations have featured in productions by the Australian Ballet and others. Also provides a glimpse of Australian working life during the 1920s, 1930s and 1940s.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Daro Gunzburg, Elizabeth Knight and Film Australia

results.title: Betty Pounder
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Dance: Videos of Australian dancers and choreographers”.
As a dancer, ballet mistress, choreographer and director, Betty Pounder’s name is synonymous with musical theatre in Australia. She recalls the diverse and vital theatre scene in the heyday of “J.C. Williamson’s” and gives an insight into the working lives of musical performers. Pounder was responsible for presenting the work of America’s greatest choreographers and was associated with the Australian productions of landmark musicals such as “The Pyjama Game”, “Man of La Mancha”, “Camelot” and “My Fair Lady”. Pounder discusses the impact of developments in technique and training on dance in Australia and comments on current trends in musical theatre. Research and interview by James Murdoch.

results.title: Betty Cuthbert
results.creator_credit: Kathy Mueller, Pamela Vanneck, Ron Saunders, Coote and Carroll and Roadshow Television
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Willesee’s Australians”.
This moving drama series on important figures from Australia’s past brings history to life. Betty Cuthbert, the “Golden Girl”, held a very special place in the affections of the sporting world because of her immense courage, optimism and innate modesty. Betty competed in 3 Olympic Games during her 13 year career as the world’s greatest female runner.

results.title: Betty blue = 37.2 Le Matin (Director's cut)
results.creator_credit: Jean-Jacques Beineix, Volker Lemke, Cargo Films and Constellation Productions
results.brief_description: A contemporary tale of ‘amour fou’ based on the novel by Phillipe Djian, “Betty blue” is the story of Zorg (Jean-Hugues Anglade) who at 31 has accepted a certain measure of resignation, and the beautiful, passionate nineteen year old Betty (Beatrice Dalle), who dramatically enters his life and proceeds to dismantle his complacency with her volatile, urgent nature. Betty and Zorg’s life together is dominated by Betty’s fearless embracing of whatever emotion or new circumstance presents itself. This propels them both into a series of events and encounters by turns comic and poignant. Betty’s restlessness and her ever-worsening mental illness finds a focus in Zorg. She decides he is a brilliant writer and she sets about despatching his diaries to potential publishers. In the face of disappointment, however, Betty’s increasingly extreme reactions begin to reveal an instinct for self-destruction that Zorg is helpless to subdue. French language with English subtitles.

results.title: Better work methods. Pt. 5
results.brief_description: Illustrates original and then improved methods for (i) opening shipping cartons for breakfast cereal; (ii) trimming asparagus; (iii) folding packing papers; (iv) arranging height of work benches; (v) arranging seating accommodation for operatives. Silent film with English intertitles.
results.description: Illustrates original and then improved methods for (i) opening shipping cartons for breakfast cereal; (ii) trimming asparagus; (iii) folding packing papers; (iv) arranging height of work benches; (v) arranging seating accommodation for operatives. results.title: Better work methods. Pt. 4
results.brief_description: Illustrates original and then improved methods for (i) assembling special door knob; (ii) assembling cast-iron plates; (iii) burring hole in angle plates; (iv) soldering wire to copper strip. Silent film with English intertitles.

results.title: Better work methods. Pt. 3
results.brief_description: Illustrates original and then improved methods of (i) filling envelopes with advertising material; (ii) folding paper cartons; (iii) arranging tools and materials to be within easy reach; (iv) developing good typing technique. Silent film with English intertitles.
